title: Dialogue Manager
description: A personal Unity project focused on building a node-based dialogue system using Unityâ€™s Graph View library. Allows branching dialogue with multiple choices. Built to explore editor tool development and data structuring within Unity.

title: Power
description: A cooperative puzzle game where players solve challenges through communication. Developed by a five-person team, with an early prototype created in Unity before moving to Unreal for final development.

title: Natural Interactions
description: A final-year VR research project studying the impact of hand tracking versus controller input on user presence. Users place furniture in a virtual room using either natural or conventional interactions.

title: Escape the Carnival
description: A group project where players complete carnival-themed mini-games to escape. Developed with three collaborators using GitHub for version control and teamwork.

title: Unity Development Tools
description: A set of custom editor tools for Unity, including a Dialogue Importer, Quick Placement Tool, and Camera Controller. Built to streamline development and explore Unity Editor scripting.
